title: On a broad family of quasi-Banach modulation spaces
authors: Joachim Toft, Christine Pfeuffer, Nenad Teofanov
abstract:
Let $\mathscr B$ be a normal quasi-Banach function space with respect to $r_0
\in (0,1]$ and $v_0$, $\omega$ be $v$-moderate, and let $r\in [r_0,\infty ]$.
Then we prove that $f$ belongs to the modulation space $M(\omega ,\mathscr B
)$, iff $V_\phi f$ belongs to the Wiener amalgam space $W ^r(\omega ,\mathscr B
)$, and $$ \| f \| _{M(\omega , \mathscr B)} \asymp \| V _\phi f \, \omega \|
_{\mathscr B} \asymp \| V _\phi f\| _{W ^r(\omega, \mathscr B)}. $$ We also
show that the result can be useful in different situations. For example, we
prove for $f,g\in \Sigma _1'\setminus 0$ that $V_gf\in L^{r_0}_{(v)}$, iff
$f,g\in M^{r_0}_{(v)}$.
